lrc.lyric:
[by:蠢梨Sherry]
[00:26.85]I got a long way to go
[00:30.10]And a long memory
[00:33.10]I been searching for an answer
[00:36.54]Always just out of reach
[00:39.74]Blood on the floor
[00:43.28]Sirens repeat
[00:46.11]I been searching for the courage
[00:49.67]To face my enemies
[00:52.32]When they turn down the lights
[00:56.08]I hear my battle symphony
[01:01.14]All the world in front of me
[01:03.80]If my armor breaks
[01:07.29]I’ll fuse it back together
[01:10.70]Battle symphony
[01:13.84]Please just don’t give up on me
[01:16.60]And my eyes are wide awake
[01:22.75]For my battle symphony
[01:26.79]For my battle symphony
[01:36.25]They say that I don’t belong
[01:39.19]Say that I should retreat
[01:42.52]That I’m marching to the rhythm
[01:45.91]Of a lonesome defeat
[01:48.83]But the sound of your voice
[01:52.25]Puts the pain in reverse
[01:55.41]No surrender, no illusions
[01:58.73]And for better or worse
[02:01.62]When they turn down the lights
[02:04.74]I hear my battle symphony
[02:08.67]All the world in front of me
[02:11.38]If my armor breaks
[02:14.70]I’ll fuse it back together
[02:18.44]Battle symphony
[02:21.59]Please just don’t give up on me
[02:24.34]And my eyes are wide awake
[02:30.89]If I fall, get knocked down
[02:33.76]Pick myself up off the ground
[02:37.04]If I fall, get knocked down
[02:40.16]Pick myself up off the ground
[02:43.58]When they turn down the lights
[02:47.64]I hear my battle symphony
[02:52.18]All the world in front of me
[02:54.84]If my armor breaks
[02:58.22]I’ll fuse it back together
[03:01.94]Battle symphony
[03:05.01]Please just don’t give up on me
[03:07.80]And my eyes are wide awake
[03:13.95]For my battle symphony
[03:20.38]For my battle symphony
[03:27.52]

tlyric.lyric:
[by:KRees]
[00:26.85]漫漫路途在我前头
[00:30.10]留下冗长的记忆
[00:33.10]我一直在探索真正的答案
[00:36.54]却总差一尺之距
[00:39.74]热血地上挥洒过
[00:43.28]扰音回荡不停
[00:46.11]我不断地寻找坚毅的勇气
[00:49.67]以直面我的夙敌
[00:52.32]当他们将光芒熄灭掩盖
[00:56.08]我听到我的战乐响起
[01:01.14]浩航世界呈现在眼底
[01:03.80]若我铠甲被打碎
[01:07.29]我要将碎片熔铸缝合
[01:10.70]战斗交响曲
[01:13.84]请勿轻易地把我放弃
[01:16.60]我的双目依旧清醒
[01:22.75]为我的战斗交响曲
[01:26.79]为我的战斗交响曲
[01:36.25]他们说我无可归依
[01:39.19]告诉我该退却逃避
[01:42.52]眼看我随韵律向前行进
[01:45.91]背负孤寂的挫折
[01:48.83]然而你嘹亮的嗓音
[01:52.25]令辛酸痛楚逆转
[01:55.41]绝不投降，不抱幻想
[01:58.73]无论安逸或艰苦
[02:01.62]当他们将光芒熄灭掩盖
[02:04.74]我听到我的战乐响起
[02:08.67]浩航世界呈现在眼底
[02:11.38]若我铠甲被打碎
[02:14.70]我要将碎片熔铸缝合
[02:18.44]战斗交响曲
[02:21.59]请勿轻易地把我放弃
[02:24.34]我的双目依旧清醒
[02:30.89]若我失落，被击倒
[02:33.76]让我自己重新站立振作
[02:37.04]若我失落，被击倒
[02:40.16]让我自己重新站立振作
[02:43.58]当他们将光芒熄灭掩盖
[02:47.64]我听到我的战乐响起
[02:52.18]浩航世界呈现在眼底
[02:54.84]若我铠甲被打碎
[02:58.22]我要将碎片熔铸缝合
[03:01.94]战斗交响曲
[03:05.01]请勿轻易地把我放弃
[03:07.80]我的双目依旧清醒
[03:13.95]为我的战斗交响曲
[03:20.38]为我的战斗交响曲
[03:27.52]
